Name: Chevo Lurker: Exodus
About the game: In the land of Zyorzia monsters roam out from all corners of the world. Our hero needs to vanquish these enemies the best way he can. Gaining fortune and fame and using said fortune to continue on the struggle. To restore light to the world once again! Level Up~ Traditional RPG Battle Engine~ Venture in the land of Zyorzia~ Inventory & Skill System~ 5000 Achievements~
